comments.body: Use the license file in the source

The source at this version did not have a license file. @cmbant has added a license for the source to the repo and so I am including it by hand for now. Once the version gets bumped (which is blocked by gfortran 6+ being in conda), we can pull it from the source.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +78,82 @@  license: modified LGPL
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/LICENSE
  summary: Code for Anisotropies in the Microwave Background
  description: |
